alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 30 at 11:46PM PST until February 02 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A WINTER STORM WARNING IS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM PST THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL 4 PM PST FRIDAY AFTERNOON ABOVE 5,000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 5,000 feet. Snowfall 8 to 16 inches above 7,000 feet. Total snow accumulations 4 to 8 inches from 6,000 feet to 7,000 feet. Snowfall 2 to 4 inches from 5,000 feet to 6,000 feet. Winds will gust as high as 55 mph on exposed ridgetops. * WHERE...The Kern County mountains. * WHEN...From 4 AM PST Thursday morning until 4 PM PST Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you plan to travel, consider alternate strategies. If you must travel, remember to carry tire chains, plenty of food, a good deal of water, warm clothing, and a flashlight in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
